body_html: Using Docker is a good solution to have a reproducible environment. You can install docker from here. As answered by Soumith, you can use the Dockerfile. You can also try using datmo in order setup environment and track machine learning projects for making it reproducible.
body_text: Using Docker is a good solution to have a reproducible environment. You can install docker from here. As answered by Soumith, you can use the Dockerfile. You can also try using datmo in order setup environment and track machine learning projects for making it reproducible.
body: Using Docker is a good solution to have a reproducible environment. You can install docker from [here](https://docs.docker.com/engine/installation/). As answered by Soumith, you can use the Dockerfile. You can also try using [datmo](https://datmo.com) in order setup environment and track machine learning projects for making it reproducible.
